satisfies

ğ”¼â¢[â€–gâ¢(x)2â€–]â‰¤2â¢(fâ¢(x0)âˆ’finf)â¢Ln2â¢âˆ‘i=1n1âˆ’pipiâ¢Bi+â€–âˆ‡fâ¢(x)â€–2+Ïƒ2n2â¢âˆ‘i=1n1piâ¢Bi.ğ”¼delimited-[]normğ‘”superscriptğ‘¥22ğ‘“subscriptğ‘¥0superscriptğ‘“infimumğ¿superscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“ğ‘¥2superscriptğœ2superscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|g(x)^{2}\right\|\right]\leq\frac{2\left(f(x_{0})-f^{% \inf}\right)L}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1-p_{i}}{p_{i}B_{i}}+\left\|\nabla f(% x)\right\|^{2}+\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}.blackboard_E [ âˆ¥ italic_g ( italic_x ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ ] â‰¤ divide start_ARG 2 ( italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_inf end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG + âˆ¥ âˆ‡ italic_f ( italic_x ) âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_Ïƒ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

We are ready to prove TheoremÂ C.1. First, let us restate the theorem.

Theorem C.1.

Assume that AssumptionsÂ 4.1, 4.2 hold for the function fğ‘“fitalic_f and 4.3 holds for the function fisubscriptğ‘“ğ‘–f_{i}italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for all iâˆˆ[n]ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›i\in[n]italic_i âˆˆ [ italic_n ]. Let Î³=minâ¡{1Lâ¢Î±â¢K,1Lâ¢Î²,Îµ2â¢Lâ¢Î¶}ğ›¾1ğ¿ğ›¼ğ¾1ğ¿ğ›½ğœ€2ğ¿ğœ\gamma=\min\left\{\frac{1}{\sqrt{L\alpha K}},\frac{1}{L\beta},\frac{% \varepsilon}{2L\zeta}\right\}italic_Î³ = roman_min { divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_L italic_Î± italic_K end_ARG end_ARG , divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L italic_Î² end_ARG , divide start_ARG italic_Îµ end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L italic_Î¶ end_ARG } in FootnoteÂ 10. Then after

Kâ‰¥12â¢Î”â¢LÎµâ¢maxâ¡{Î²,12â¢Î”â¢Î±Îµ,2â¢Î¶Îµ},ğ¾12Î”ğ¿ğœ€ğ›½12Î”ğ›¼ğœ€2ğœğœ€\displaystyle K\geq\frac{12\Delta L}{\varepsilon}\max\left\{\beta,\frac{12% \Delta\alpha}{\varepsilon},\frac{2\zeta}{\varepsilon}\right\},italic_K â‰¥ divide start_ARG 12 roman_Î” italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_Îµ end_ARG roman_max { italic_Î² , divide start_ARG 12 roman_Î” italic_Î± end_ARG start_ARG italic_Îµ end_ARG , divide start_ARG 2 italic_Î¶ end_ARG start_ARG italic_Îµ end_ARG } ,

iterations, the method guarantees that min0â‰¤kâ‰¤Kâ¡ğ”¼â¢[â€–âˆ‡fâ¢(xk)â€–2]â‰¤Îµsubscript0ğ‘˜ğ¾ğ”¼delimited-[]superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“superscriptğ‘¥ğ‘˜2ğœ€\min_{0\leq k\leq K}\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|\nabla f(x^{k})\right\|^{2}\right]\leq\varepsilonroman_min start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 â‰¤ italic_k â‰¤ italic_K end_POSTSUBSCRIPT blackboard_E [ âˆ¥ âˆ‡ italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_k end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ] â‰¤ italic_Îµ, where Î”=fâ¢(x0)âˆ’finfÎ”ğ‘“subscriptğ‘¥0superscriptğ‘“infimum\Delta=f(x_{0})-f^{\inf}roman_Î” = italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_inf end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT and

Î±=Ln2â¢âˆ‘i=1n1âˆ’pipiâ¢Bi,Î²=1,Î¶=Ïƒ2n2â¢âˆ‘i=1n1piâ¢Bi.formulae-sequenceğ›¼ğ¿superscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–formulae-sequenceğ›½1ğœsuperscriptğœ2superscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–\alpha=\frac{L}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1-p_{i}}{p_{i}B_{i}},\quad\beta=1,% \quad\zeta=\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}.italic_Î± = divide start_ARG italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG , italic_Î² = 1 , italic_Î¶ = divide start_ARG italic_Ïƒ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .
Proof.

Note that FootnoteÂ 10 can be viewed as a special case of classical stochastic gradient descent (SGD), as reformulated in AlgorithmÂ 8. We need to verify that the gradient estimator fulfills the conditions required by classical SGD (TheoremÂ E.2). The two preceding lemmas address this requirement precisely. Specifically, LemmaÂ H.1 confirms that the gradient estimator used in AlgorithmÂ 8 is unbiased, while LemmaÂ H.2 verifies that the variance of this estimator meets the conditions specified in E.1. Consequently, it remains to apply TheoremÂ E.2. âˆ

H.1.1 Proof of LemmaÂ H.1

Lemma H.1.1.

The gradient estimator in AlgorithmÂ 8 given by

gâ¢(x):=1nâ¢âˆ‘i=1n1piâ¢Biâ¢âˆ‘j=1BiIâ¢(Î·ijâ‰¤ti)â¢âˆ‡fiâ¢(x;Î¾ij)assignğ‘”ğ‘¥1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1subscriptğµğ‘–ğ¼superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘–ğ‘—subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ‘¥superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘–ğ‘—g(x):=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\sum_{j=1}^{B_{i}}I\left(% \eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\nabla f_{i}\left(x;\xi_{i}^{j}\right)italic_g ( italic_x ) := divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_I ( italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) âˆ‡ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )

is unbiased, i.e., ğ”¼â¢[gâ¢(x)]=âˆ‡fâ¢(x)ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ‘”ğ‘¥âˆ‡ğ‘“ğ‘¥\mathbb{E}\left[g(x)\right]=\nabla f(x)blackboard_E [ italic_g ( italic_x ) ] = âˆ‡ italic_f ( italic_x ) for all xâˆˆâ„dğ‘¥superscriptâ„ğ‘‘x\in\mathbb{R}^{d}italic_x âˆˆ blackboard_R start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_d end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT.

Proof.

This follows from direct computation:

ğ”¼â¢[gâ¢(x)]ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ‘”ğ‘¥\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[g(x)\right]blackboard_E [ italic_g ( italic_x ) ] =\displaystyle== ğ”¼â¢[1nâ¢âˆ‘i=1n1piâ¢Biâ¢âˆ‘j=1BiIâ¢(Î·ijâ‰¤ti)â¢âˆ‡fiâ¢(x;Î¾ij)]ğ”¼delimited-[]1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1subscriptğµğ‘–ğ¼superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘–ğ‘—subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ‘¥superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘–ğ‘—\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\sum% _{j=1}^{B_{i}}I\left(\eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\nabla f_{i}\left(x;\xi_{i}^% {j}\right)\right]blackboard_E [ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_I ( italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) âˆ‡ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ]
=\displaystyle== 1nâ¢âˆ‘i=1n1piâ¢Biâ¢âˆ‘j=1Biğ”¼â¢[Iâ¢(Î·ijâ‰¤ti)â¢âˆ‡fiâ¢(x;Î¾ij)]1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1subscriptğµğ‘–ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¼superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘–ğ‘—subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ‘¥superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘–ğ‘—\displaystyle\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\sum_{j=1}^{B_{i}}% \mathbb{E}\left[I\left(\eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\nabla f_{i}\left(x;\xi_{i% }^{j}\right)\right]divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_E [ italic_I ( italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) âˆ‡ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ]
=(Î·ijâŸ‚âŸ‚Î¾ij)\displaystyle\overset{\left(\eta_{i}^{j}\perp\!\!\!\!\perp\xi_{i}^{j}\right)}{=}start_OVERACCENT ( italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âŸ‚ âŸ‚ italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_OVERACCENT start_ARG = end_ARG 1nâ¢âˆ‘i=1n1piâ¢Biâ¢âˆ‘j=1Biğ”¼â¢[Iâ¢(Î·ijâ‰¤ti)]â¢ğ”¼â¢[âˆ‡fiâ¢(x;Î¾ij)]1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1subscriptğµğ‘–ğ”¼delimited-[]ğ¼superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘–ğ‘—subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–ğ”¼delimited-[]âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ‘¥superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘–ğ‘—\displaystyle\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\sum_{j=1}^{B_{i}}% \mathbb{E}\left[I\left(\eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\right]\mathbb{E}\left[% \nabla f_{i}\left(x;\xi_{i}^{j}\right)\right]divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT blackboard_E [ italic_I ( italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] blackboard_E [ âˆ‡ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ]
=\displaystyle== 1nâ¢âˆ‘i=1n1piâ¢Biâ¢âˆ‘j=1Bipiâ¢âˆ‡fiâ¢(x)1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1subscriptğµğ‘–subscriptğ‘ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ‘¥\displaystyle\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\sum_{j=1}^{B_{i}}p_% {i}\nabla f_{i}(x)divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âˆ‡ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x )
=\displaystyle== 1nâ¢âˆ‘i=1nâˆ‡fiâ¢(x)1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ‘¥\displaystyle\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\nabla f_{i}(x)divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ‡ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x )
=\displaystyle== âˆ‡fâ¢(x).âˆ‡ğ‘“ğ‘¥\displaystyle\nabla f(x).âˆ‡ italic_f ( italic_x ) .

âˆ

H.1.2 Proof of LemmaÂ H.2

Lemma H.2.

The gradient estimator in AlgorithmÂ 8 given by

gâ¢(x):=1nâ¢âˆ‘i=1n1piâ¢Biâ¢âˆ‘j=1BiIâ¢(Î·ijâ‰¤ti)â¢âˆ‡fiâ¢(x;Î¾ij)assignğ‘”ğ‘¥1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1subscriptğµğ‘–ğ¼superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘–ğ‘—subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ‘¥superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘–ğ‘—g(x):=\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\sum_{j=1}^{B_{i}}I\left(% \eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\nabla f_{i}\left(x;\xi_{i}^{j}\right)italic_g ( italic_x ) := divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_I ( italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) âˆ‡ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )

satisfies

ğ”¼â¢[â€–gâ¢(x)2â€–]â‰¤2â¢Lâ¢(fâ¢(x0)âˆ’finf)n2â¢âˆ‘i=1n1âˆ’pipiâ¢Bi+â€–âˆ‡fâ¢(x)â€–2+Ïƒ2n2â¢âˆ‘i=1n1piâ¢Bi.ğ”¼delimited-[]normğ‘”superscriptğ‘¥22ğ¿ğ‘“subscriptğ‘¥0superscriptğ‘“infimumsuperscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“ğ‘¥2superscriptğœ2superscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|g(x)^{2}\right\|\right]\leq\frac{2L\left(f(x_{0})-f^{% \inf}\right)}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1-p_{i}}{p_{i}B_{i}}+\left\|\nabla f(x% )\right\|^{2}+\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}.blackboard_E [ âˆ¥ italic_g ( italic_x ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ ] â‰¤ divide start_ARG 2 italic_L ( italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_inf end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG + âˆ¥ âˆ‡ italic_f ( italic_x ) âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_Ïƒ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .
Proof.

Since Î·ijsuperscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘–ğ‘—\eta_{i}^{j}italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT and Î¾ijsuperscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘–ğ‘—\xi_{i}^{j}italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT are independent from each other for all iâˆˆ[n]ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›i\in[n]italic_i âˆˆ [ italic_n ] and jğ‘—jitalic_j, we have

Varâ¢(gâ¢(x))Varğ‘”ğ‘¥\displaystyle\mathrm{Var}\left(g(x)\right)roman_Var ( italic_g ( italic_x ) ) =\displaystyle== 1n2â¢âˆ‘i=1n1pi2â¢Bi2â¢âˆ‘j=1BiVarâ¢(Iâ¢(Î·ijâ‰¤ti)â¢âˆ‡fiâ¢(x;Î¾ij)),1superscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘–2superscriptsubscriptğµğ‘–2superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1subscriptğµğ‘–Varğ¼superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘–ğ‘—subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ‘¥superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘–ğ‘—\displaystyle\frac{1}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}^{2}B_{i}^{2}}\sum_{j=% 1}^{B_{i}}\mathrm{Var}\left(I\left(\eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\nabla f_{i}% \left(x;\xi_{i}^{j}\right)\right),divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_Var ( italic_I ( italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) âˆ‡ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) ,

then we use the fact that

Varâ¢(Xâ¢Y)=Varâ¢(X)â¢Varâ¢(Y)+Varâ¢(X)â¢ğ”¼â¢[Y]2+Varâ¢(Y)â¢ğ”¼â¢[X]2,Varğ‘‹ğ‘ŒVarğ‘‹Varğ‘ŒVarğ‘‹ğ”¼superscriptdelimited-[]ğ‘Œ2Varğ‘Œğ”¼superscriptdelimited-[]ğ‘‹2\mathrm{Var}\left(XY\right)=\mathrm{Var}\left(X\right)\mathrm{Var}\left(Y% \right)+\mathrm{Var}\left(X\right)\mathbb{E}\left[Y\right]^{2}+\mathrm{Var}% \left(Y\right)\mathbb{E}\left[X\right]^{2},roman_Var ( italic_X italic_Y ) = roman_Var ( italic_X ) roman_Var ( italic_Y ) + roman_Var ( italic_X ) blackboard_E [ italic_Y ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + roman_Var ( italic_Y ) blackboard_E [ italic_X ] start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ,

where Xğ‘‹Xitalic_X and Yğ‘ŒYitalic_Y are independent random variables. Hence, we obtain the following bound on the variance

Varâ¢(Iâ¢(Î·ijâ‰¤ti)â¢âˆ‡fiâ¢(x;Î¾ij))Varğ¼superscriptsubscriptğœ‚ğ‘–ğ‘—subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–âˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ‘¥superscriptsubscriptğœ‰ğ‘–ğ‘—\displaystyle\mathrm{Var}\left(I\left(\eta_{i}^{j}\leq t_{i}\right)\nabla f_{i% }\left(x;\xi_{i}^{j}\right)\right)roman_Var ( italic_I ( italic_Î· start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) âˆ‡ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ; italic_Î¾ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_j end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) ) â‰¤\displaystyle\leqâ‰¤ piâ¢(1âˆ’pi)â¢Ïƒ2+piâ¢(1âˆ’pi)â¢â€–âˆ‡fiâ¢(x)â€–2+Ïƒ2â¢pi2subscriptğ‘ğ‘–1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–superscriptğœ2subscriptğ‘ğ‘–1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–superscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ‘¥2superscriptğœ2superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘–2\displaystyle p_{i}(1-p_{i})\sigma^{2}+p_{i}\left(1-p_{i}\right)\left\|\nabla f% _{i}(x)\right\|^{2}+\sigma^{2}p_{i}^{2}italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) italic_Ïƒ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) âˆ¥ âˆ‡ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ) âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_Ïƒ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
=\displaystyle== piâ¢Ïƒ2+piâ¢(1âˆ’pi)â¢â€–âˆ‡fiâ¢(x)â€–2.subscriptğ‘ğ‘–superscriptğœ2subscriptğ‘ğ‘–1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–superscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ‘¥2\displaystyle p_{i}\sigma^{2}+p_{i}\left(1-p_{i}\right)\left\|\nabla f_{i}(x)% \right\|^{2}.italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ïƒ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) âˆ¥ âˆ‡ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ) âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT .

As a result, the variance of gâ¢(x)ğ‘”ğ‘¥g(x)italic_g ( italic_x ) is bounded by

Varâ¢(gâ¢(x))Varğ‘”ğ‘¥\displaystyle\mathrm{Var}\left(g(x)\right)roman_Var ( italic_g ( italic_x ) ) â‰¤\displaystyle\leqâ‰¤ 1n2â¢âˆ‘i=1n1pi2â¢Bi2â¢âˆ‘j=1Bi(piâ¢Ïƒ2+piâ¢(1âˆ’pi)â¢â€–âˆ‡fiâ¢(x)â€–2)1superscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1superscriptsubscriptğ‘ğ‘–2superscriptsubscriptğµğ‘–2superscriptsubscriptğ‘—1subscriptğµğ‘–subscriptğ‘ğ‘–superscriptğœ2subscriptğ‘ğ‘–1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–superscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ‘¥2\displaystyle\frac{1}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}^{2}B_{i}^{2}}\sum_{j=% 1}^{B_{i}}\left(p_{i}\sigma^{2}+p_{i}\left(1-p_{i}\right)\left\|\nabla f_{i}(x% )\right\|^{2}\right)divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_j = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ( italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_Ïƒ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) âˆ¥ âˆ‡ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ) âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT )
=\displaystyle== 1n2â¢âˆ‘i=1n1piâ¢Biâ¢(Ïƒ2+(1âˆ’pi)â¢â€–âˆ‡fiâ¢(x)â€–2).1superscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–superscriptğœ21subscriptğ‘ğ‘–superscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ‘¥2\displaystyle\frac{1}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}\left(\sigma^{2}% +\left(1-p_{i}\right)\left\|\nabla f_{i}(x)\right\|^{2}\right).divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ( italic_Ïƒ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + ( 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) âˆ¥ âˆ‡ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ) âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) .

Finally

ğ”¼â¢[â€–gâ¢(x)2â€–]ğ”¼delimited-[]normğ‘”superscriptğ‘¥2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|g(x)^{2}\right\|\right]blackboard_E [ âˆ¥ italic_g ( italic_x ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ ] =\displaystyle== Varâ¢(gâ¢(x))+â€–ğ”¼â¢[gâ¢(x)]â€–2Varğ‘”ğ‘¥superscriptnormğ”¼delimited-[]ğ‘”ğ‘¥2\displaystyle\mathrm{Var}\left(g(x)\right)+\|\mathbb{E}\left[g(x)\right]\|^{2}roman_Var ( italic_g ( italic_x ) ) + âˆ¥ blackboard_E [ italic_g ( italic_x ) ] âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT
â‰¤absent\displaystyle\overset{\leq}{}overâ‰¤ start_ARG end_ARG â€–âˆ‡fâ¢(x)â€–2+1n2â¢âˆ‘i=1n1âˆ’pipiâ¢Biâ¢â€–âˆ‡fiâ¢(x)â€–2+Ïƒ2n2â¢âˆ‘i=1n1piâ¢Bi.superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“ğ‘¥21superscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–superscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ‘¥2superscriptğœ2superscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–\displaystyle\left\|\nabla f(x)\right\|^{2}+\frac{1}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac% {1-p_{i}}{p_{i}B_{i}}\left\|\nabla f_{i}(x)\right\|^{2}+\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n^{2% }}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}.âˆ¥ âˆ‡ italic_f ( italic_x ) âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ¥ âˆ‡ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ) âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_Ïƒ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

Next we use â€–âˆ‡fiâ¢(x)â€–2â‰¤2â¢Lâ¢(fâ¢(x0)âˆ’finf)superscriptnormâˆ‡subscriptğ‘“ğ‘–ğ‘¥22ğ¿ğ‘“subscriptğ‘¥0superscriptğ‘“infimum\left\|\nabla f_{i}(x)\right\|^{2}\leq 2L\left(f(x_{0})-f^{\inf}\right)âˆ¥ âˆ‡ italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_x ) âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT â‰¤ 2 italic_L ( italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_inf end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ), thus

ğ”¼â¢[â€–gâ¢(x)2â€–]ğ”¼delimited-[]normğ‘”superscriptğ‘¥2\displaystyle\mathbb{E}\left[\left\|g(x)^{2}\right\|\right]blackboard_E [ âˆ¥ italic_g ( italic_x ) start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT âˆ¥ ] â‰¤\displaystyle\leqâ‰¤ 2â¢Lâ¢(fâ¢(x0)âˆ’finf)n2â¢âˆ‘i=1n1âˆ’pipiâ¢Bi+â€–âˆ‡fâ¢(x)â€–2+Ïƒ2n2â¢âˆ‘i=1n1piâ¢Bi.2ğ¿ğ‘“subscriptğ‘¥0superscriptğ‘“infimumsuperscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–superscriptnormâˆ‡ğ‘“ğ‘¥2superscriptğœ2superscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–\displaystyle\frac{2L\left(f(x_{0})-f^{\inf}\right)}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac% {1-p_{i}}{p_{i}B_{i}}+\left\|\nabla f(x)\right\|^{2}+\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n^{2}}% \sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}.divide start_ARG 2 italic_L ( italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_inf end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT ) end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG + âˆ¥ âˆ‡ italic_f ( italic_x ) âˆ¥ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT + divide start_ARG italic_Ïƒ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

âˆ

H.2 Proof of TheoremÂ C.2

The following lemma gives time complexity for any choice of B1,â€¦,Bnsubscriptğµ1â€¦subscriptğµğ‘›B_{1},\ldots,B_{n}italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , â€¦ , italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT and t=(t1,â€¦,tn)ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡1â€¦subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘›t=\left(t_{1},\ldots,t_{n}\right)italic_t = ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , â€¦ , italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) in Vecna SGD.

Lemma H.3 (Proof in SectionÂ H.2.1).

Assume that AssumptionsÂ 4.1, 4.2 hold for the function fğ‘“fitalic_f and 4.3 holds for the function fisubscriptğ‘“ğ‘–f_{i}italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for all iâˆˆ[n]ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›i\in[n]italic_i âˆˆ [ italic_n ]. Then after

Now we are ready to prove the theorem.

Theorem C.2.

Assume that AssumptionsÂ 4.1, 4.2 hold for the function fğ‘“fitalic_f and 4.3 holds for the function fisubscriptğ‘“ğ‘–f_{i}italic_f start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT for all iâˆˆ[n]ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›i\in[n]italic_i âˆˆ [ italic_n ]. Let Î³=minâ¡{1Lâ¢Î±â¢K,1L,Îµ2â¢L}ğ›¾1ğ¿ğ›¼ğ¾1ğ¿ğœ€2ğ¿\gamma=\min\left\{\frac{1}{\sqrt{L\alpha K}},\frac{1}{L},\frac{\varepsilon}{2L% }\right\}italic_Î³ = roman_min { divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG square-root start_ARG italic_L italic_Î± italic_K end_ARG end_ARG , divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_L end_ARG , divide start_ARG italic_Îµ end_ARG start_ARG 2 italic_L end_ARG } in FootnoteÂ 10, where

Î±=Ln2â¢âˆ‘i=1n1âˆ’pipiâ¢Bi,Î¶=Ïƒ2n2â¢âˆ‘i=1n1piâ¢Bi.formulae-sequenceğ›¼ğ¿superscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–ğœsuperscriptğœ2superscriptğ‘›2superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğµğ‘–\alpha=\frac{L}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1-p_{i}}{p_{i}B_{i}},\quad\zeta=% \frac{\sigma^{2}}{n^{2}}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1}{p_{i}B_{i}}.italic_Î± = divide start_ARG italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG , italic_Î¶ = divide start_ARG italic_Ïƒ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

Let t=(t1,â€¦,tn)ğ‘¡subscriptğ‘¡1â€¦subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘›t=\left(t_{1},\ldots,t_{n}\right)italic_t = ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , â€¦ , italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ), t1,â€¦,tnâ‰¥0subscriptğ‘¡1â€¦subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘›0t_{1},\ldots,t_{n}\geq 0italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT , â€¦ , italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT â‰¥ 0. Without loss of generality assume that 0<Ï„1+t1â‰¤â‹¯â‰¤Ï„n+tn0subscriptğœ1subscriptğ‘¡1â‹¯subscriptğœğ‘›subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘›0<\tau_{1}+t_{1}\leq\cdots\leq\tau_{n}+t_{n}0 < italic_Ï„ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT â‰¤ â‹¯ â‰¤ italic_Ï„ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT. Let

T=Ï„n+tn+[1nâ¢âˆ‘i=1nÏ„i+tipi]â¢Ïƒ2nâ¢Îµ+[1nâ¢âˆ‘i=1n1âˆ’pipiâ¢(Ï„i+ti)]â¢Î”â¢Lnâ¢Îµ,ğ‘‡subscriptğœğ‘›subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘›delimited-[]1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›subscriptğœğ‘–subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–subscriptğ‘ğ‘–superscriptğœ2ğ‘›ğœ€delimited-[]1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–Î”ğ¿ğ‘›ğœ€T=\tau_{n}+t_{n}+\left[\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{\tau_{i}+t_{i}}{p_{i}}% \right]\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n\varepsilon}+\left[\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{1-% p_{i}}{p_{i}}\left(\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\right]\frac{\Delta L}{n\varepsilon},italic_T = italic_Ï„ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + [ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_Ï„ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ] divide start_ARG italic_Ïƒ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n italic_Îµ end_ARG + [ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ( italic_Ï„ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] divide start_ARG roman_Î” italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_n italic_Îµ end_ARG ,

where Î”=fâ¢(x0)âˆ’finfÎ”ğ‘“subscriptğ‘¥0superscriptğ‘“infimum\Delta=f(x_{0})-f^{\inf}roman_Î” = italic_f ( italic_x start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 0 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) - italic_f start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT roman_inf end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT. Put

Bi=âŒˆbiâŒ‰,bi=TÏ„i+ti.formulae-sequencesubscriptğµğ‘–subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğ‘ğ‘–ğ‘‡subscriptğœğ‘–subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–B_{i}=\lceil b_{i}\rceil,\quad b_{i}=\frac{T}{\tau_{i}+t_{i}}.italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = âŒˆ italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT âŒ‰ , italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT = divide start_ARG italic_T end_ARG start_ARG italic_Ï„ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG .

Then, Vecna SGD guarantees to find an Ïµitalic-Ïµ\epsilonitalic_Ïµ-stationary point after

Tğ–µğ–¾ğ–¼ğ—‡ğ–ºğ–²ğ–¦ğ–£â¢(t)â‰¥288Ã—Î”â¢LÎµâ¢(Ï„n+tn+[1nâ¢âˆ‘i=1nÏ„i+tipi]â¢Ïƒ2nâ¢Îµ+[1nâ¢âˆ‘i=1n1âˆ’pipiâ¢(Ï„i+ti)]â¢Î”â¢Lnâ¢Îµ)subscriptğ‘‡ğ–µğ–¾ğ–¼ğ—‡ğ–ºğ–²ğ–¦ğ–£ğ‘¡288Î”ğ¿ğœ€subscriptğœğ‘›subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘›delimited-[]1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›subscriptğœğ‘–subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–subscriptğ‘ğ‘–superscriptğœ2ğ‘›ğœ€delimited-[]1ğ‘›superscriptsubscriptğ‘–1ğ‘›1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–Î”ğ¿ğ‘›ğœ€T_{{{\sf\footnotesize\color[rgb]{0.75390625,0,0}\definecolor[named]{% pgfstrokecolor}{rgb}{0.75390625,0,0}VecnaSGD}}}(t)\geq 288\times\frac{\Delta L% }{\varepsilon}\left(\tau_{n}+t_{n}+\left[\frac{1}{n}\sum_{i=1}^{n}\frac{\tau_{% i}+t_{i}}{p_{i}}\right]\frac{\sigma^{2}}{n\varepsilon}+\left[\frac{1}{n}\sum_{% i=1}^{n}\frac{1-p_{i}}{p_{i}}\left(\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\right]\frac{\Delta L}% {n\varepsilon}\right)italic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT sansserif_VecnaSGD end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_t ) â‰¥ 288 Ã— divide start_ARG roman_Î” italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_Îµ end_ARG ( italic_Ï„ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + [ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG italic_Ï„ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ] divide start_ARG italic_Ïƒ start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_n italic_Îµ end_ARG + [ divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG italic_n end_ARG âˆ‘ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i = 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT italic_n end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT divide start_ARG 1 - italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG start_ARG italic_p start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT end_ARG ( italic_Ï„ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) ] divide start_ARG roman_Î” italic_L end_ARG start_ARG italic_n italic_Îµ end_ARG )

seconds.

Proof.

Since we have biâ‰¥1subscriptğ‘ğ‘–1b_{i}\geq 1italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT â‰¥ 1 for all iâˆˆ[n]ğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›i\in[n]italic_i âˆˆ [ italic_n ], we get

maxiâˆˆ[n]â¡{Biâ¢(Ï„i+ti)}â‰¤maxiâˆˆ[n]â¡{(bi+1)â¢(Ï„i+ti)}â‰¤2â¢maxiâˆˆ[n]â¡{biâ¢(Ï„i+ti)}=2â¢T.subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›subscriptğµğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›subscriptğ‘ğ‘–1subscriptğœğ‘–subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–2subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›subscriptğ‘ğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–2ğ‘‡\max_{i\in[n]}\{B_{i}\left(\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\}\leq\max_{i\in[n]}\{\left(b_% {i}+1\right)\left(\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\}\leq 2\max_{i\in[n]}\{b_{i}\left(\tau% _{i}+t_{i}\right)\}=2T.roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i âˆˆ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Ï„ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } â‰¤ roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i âˆˆ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { ( italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1 ) ( italic_Ï„ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } â‰¤ 2 roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i âˆˆ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_b start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Ï„ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } = 2 italic_T .

It remains to apply LemmaÂ H.3. We get

H.2.1 Proof of LemmaÂ H.3

Lemma H.3.

Finally, let ğ’¯ğ’¯\mathcal{T}caligraphic_T be the random time required for one iteration of Vecna SGD. We get

ğ’¯=maxiâˆˆ[n]â¡ğ’¯iâ¢(ti)â‰¤maxiâˆˆ[n]â¡{Biâ¢(Ï„i+ti)}.ğ’¯subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›subscriptğ’¯ğ‘–subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–subscriptğ‘–delimited-[]ğ‘›subscriptğµğ‘–subscriptğœğ‘–subscriptğ‘¡ğ‘–\mathcal{T}=\max_{i\in[n]}\mathcal{T}_{i}(t_{i})\leq\max_{i\in[n]}\{B_{i}\left% (\tau_{i}+t_{i}\right)\}.caligraphic_T = roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i âˆˆ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT caligraphic_T start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) â‰¤ roman_max start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i âˆˆ [ italic_n ] end_POSTSUBSCRIPT { italic_B start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_Ï„ start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_t start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) } . It remains to multiply ğ’¯ğ’¯\mathcal{T}caligraphic_T with the number of iterations Kğ¾Kitalic_K given by TheoremÂ C.1. âˆ
